Uses of Class
org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message

  • Packages that use Message 
    Package Description
    org.fhnw.aigs.commons  
    org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication  

    • Uses of Message in org.fhnw.aigs.commons

      Methods in org.fhnw.aigs.commons with parameters of type Message 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static javax.xml.bind.Marshaller XMLHelper.getUnformattedXMLMarshaller(Message message)
      This method returns a Marshaller .
      abstract void Game.processGameLogic(Message message, Player sendingPlayer)
      This method is the core of every game on the server side.
      void Game.sendMessageToAllPlayers(Message message)
      Sends a message to all players in the current game.
      void Game.sendMessageToCurrentPlayer(Message message)
      Sends a message to the current player.
      void Game.sendMessageToPlayer(Message message, Player player)
      Sends a message to a single player.

    • Uses of Message in org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication

      Subclasses of Message in org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BadInputMessage
      This message is sent to a client when the server receives an invalid input.
      class  ClientClosedMessage
      This message is sent by every client that uses the BaseClient.
      class  ExceptionMessage
      The server sends this message to a player who caused an exception on the server side.
      class  FieldChangedMessage
      This message can be used in games where the fields are under the control of a certain player.
      class  FieldClickFeedbackMessage
      This message can be used to indicate a feedback for players.
      class  FieldClickMessage
      This message is sent by clients to indicate that the user clicked on a certain field.
      class  ForceCloseMessage
      This message is sent to clients when there is an error or another event that causes the clients to close, e.g. the server shuts down, the connection was aborted etc.
      class  GameEndsMessage
      This message can be sent by the server when the game ends.
      class  GameStartMessage
      This message is sent by the server as soon as the player was identified, a join message has been sent and a game has enough participants for a new game.
      class  IdentificationMessage
      This message will be sent by the clients in order to identificate /authentificate.
      class  IdentificationResponseMessage
      This message is sent to the client as a reply to a IdentificationMessage.
      class  JoinMessage
      This message is sent to the server when a player wants to join a message.
      class  JoinResponseMessage
      This is a Message to show the Feedback of a joining (or creating) request from the AIGS server
      class  KeepAliveMessage
      This message is sent to all players in a certain interval if the KeepAliveManager is activated via the settings.
      class  NotifyMessage
      This is a general purpose Message to show a text in a client (dialog box)
      class  PlayerChangedMessage
      This message can be sent whenever the Game.currentPlayer was manually changed.
      class  ResultMessage
      This general purpose message can be used as a status message in games.
